A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: After seeing the movie twice\, the issues with continuity from TFA to TLJ are glaring. I don’t agree with how Luke’s character was treated\, and the death of Snoke seemed like such a waste. Especially after J.J. and crew built him up via interviews and plot points. However I did love Carrie’s scenes and the connection between Kylo and Rey was very interesting.
